CommandTranslatorRule:
This rule catches calls to loading sample images, in the File > Open samples... menu. It only works for remote samples (the ones that can be fetched from http://rsb.info.nih.gov/ij/images/)
# Open the sample '${command}' and store it in the variable 'image' image = IJ.openImage('http://rsb.info.nih.gov/ij/images/${arguments}') # then display it. image.show()
